response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, and I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Given its worth to you, I propose a transaction price of $12,000. This amount reflects a fair compromise between the value I place on the product and the value you see in it. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 12000}
